actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to provide governmental units with the option of issuing taxable bonds to fund public investments.
short_title: Public Investment Taxable Bond Option Act of 1983

summary.text: Public Investment Taxable Bond Option Act of 1983 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide State and local governments with the option of issuing taxable bonds to fund public investments. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified percentage of interest yield on such taxable issues. Absolves the Federal Government from liability for payment of the principal of any taxable bond. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Public Investment Taxable Bond Option Act of 1983
A bill to provide governmental units with the option of issuing taxable bonds to fund public investments.
